IsaacExt:RedStew.NAME: Red Stew
IsaacExt:RedStew.FLAVOR: Esau despised his birthright. He gave up the birthright in exchange for the red stew.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b7 and heal #b15. NL The initial counter of this relic is #b22. NL Once you enter a room, the counter decreases by #b2 ; At the end of your turn, the counter decreases by #b2 and lose #b2 #yStrength. NL At the start of each combat, gain #yStrength equal to the counter. NL When #yFatal, the counter increases by #b1 and gain #b1 #yStrength. NL When the counter returns to zero, the relic is used up.

IsaacExt:Mucormycosis.NAME: Mucormycosis
IsaacExt:Mucormycosis.FLAVOR: Mucormycosis is a fungal infection triggered by the fungus Trichoderma.The fungi that usually cause the disease are mostly Mucor spp., Rhizopus spp., furrows, or picornithiasis spp.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack , #b25% chance to apply #b1 #yFungal #ySpores or #ySpore #yCloud to an enemy.

IsaacExt:GoldenRazor.NAME: Golden Razor
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use in a combat. NL Lose #b20 gold, gain #b1 #yStrength.

IsaacExt:Sulfur.NAME: Sulfur
DESCRIPTIONS: #b3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to add a #yBloody #yBrimstone in your hand.

IsaacExt:RockBottom.NAME: Rock Bottom
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer gain negative effects. NL The amount of #yStrength , #yDexterity and #yFocus will not be able to decrease and can't be remove.

IsaacExt:BloodPuppy.NAME: Blood Puppy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, spawn a #yBlood #yPuppy pet.

IsaacExt:Sol.NAME: Sol
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you victory in a boss combat: Heal all HP(Ignore Mark of the Bloom), remove all #yCurses in your deck, at the start of each combat, gain #b2 #yStrength.

IsaacExt:Luna.NAME: Luna
IsaacExt:Luna.FLAVOR: The moon's blessing shines upon you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Starting from the next act, the probability of an ? room doubling. NL Whenever you passed a ? room, gain #b5 #ySoul #yHeart and at the start of the next combat, gain #b1 #yDexterity.

IsaacExt:Mercurius.NAME: Mercurius
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yDexterity. NL You can leave the room at any time during the combat.

IsaacExt:Venus.NAME: Venus
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise you Max HP by #b7. NL At the start of each combat, apply #b3 #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you take an unblocked #yAttack damage, the attacker lose #b3 #yStrength.

IsaacExt:Terra.NAME: Terra
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength. NL Your base #yAttack damage is halved. NL Whenever you play two attack cards, the base damage of the next attack card is quadrupled.

IsaacExt:Mars.NAME: Mars
DESCRIPTIONS: #b3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to dash, deal #b32 damage to ALL enemies. NL You are #yInvincible during the dash.

IsaacExt:Jupiter.NAME: Jupiter
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, lose #b2 #yDexterity. NL Whenever you play a #ySkill, the counter increases by #b1 and gain #b1 #yDexterity. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack, if the counter is not equal to zero, decrease the counter by #b1 and lose #b1 #yDexterity, apply #b3 #yPoison to the enemy who takes the unblocked #yAttack damage.

IsaacExt:FourPointFiveVolt.NAME: 4.5 Volt
IsaacExt:FourPointFiveVolt.FLAVOR: Beat the juice out of them!
DESCRIPTIONS: Cleaning the room will no longer charge the chargeable relics. NL For every #b70 damage done, charge the first chargeable relic in the relic list. NL A single attack can only increase charge by one at most.

IsaacExt:BatteryPack.NAME: Battery Pack
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, fully charged ALL chargeable relic and add #b3 #yBattery to your deck.

IsaacExt:Suplex.NAME: Suplex!
DESCRIPTIONS: #b3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to deal #b50 damage to an enemy.

IsaacExt:Neptunus.NAME: Neptunus
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn, gain #yDouble #yDamage next turn.

IsaacExt:Larynx.NAME: Larynx
DESCRIPTIONS: #b12 charges, right-click to use even not fully charged. NL Deals #b3 times the number of charged levels of damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase the charge by #b1 when takes an unblocked damage.

IsaacExt:BloodOath.NAME: Blood Oath
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the first combat on each act, Drain your health to #b1. NL At the start of each combat at the current act, for each #b10 HP drained, gain #b2 #yStrength, #yBlock and #b1 #yDexterity (Round up).

IsaacExt:RKey.NAME: R Key
DESCRIPTIONS: One time use relic, right click to use. NL Teleport to Exordium.

IsaacExt:Eraser.NAME: Eraser
DESCRIPTIONS: Each act can be used once against an enemy. NL If the target is a non-boss enemy, kill it instantly; If it's a boss enemy, deal #b15 damage. NL The enemies killed by Eraser will not appear in this game.

IsaacExt:GlitchedCrown.NAME: Glitched Crown
DESCRIPTIONS: Relics dropped from the combat reward screen; Relics sold in the shop; And relics in the boss relic select screen will be cycled among #b5 random relics.

IsaacExt:KeepersSack.NAME: Keeper's Sack
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you spend gold in the shop, at the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength or #b1 #yDexterity or #b1 #yFocus.

IsaacExt:TMTrainer.NAME: TMTRAINER
DESCRIPTIONS: AzZ  BZzZCDEz ZZFGzzZZ  HzIZZz zZJZZZz zKLMNOZ ZPzQRS TzzUVWZ  zzXYZab ZZZZ  cdeZZfg hZZZijkl ZZmnoZ ZZ pqrsZZ tuv wxyz1 2345 67890/ *-+!@# $%^&* ()`~<>,./? ;:'"{}[] -=

IsaacExt:RedKey.NAME: Red Key
DESCRIPTIONS: #b4 charges, when fully charged, right-click to create a new room connected with the current room.

IsaacExt:TheWafer.NAME: The Wafer
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would receive #b8 or more unblocked damage, reduce it to #b7.

IsaacExt:TheRelic.NAME: The Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 combats, gain #b10 #ySoul #yHeart.

IsaacExt:SacredHeart.NAME: Sacred Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b7 and heal all of your HP. NL At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength. NL Your attack deals #b2.3x damage.

IsaacExt:HolyGrail.NAME: Holy Grail
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise you Max HP by #b7. NL At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yFlight.

IsaacExt:TheBody.NAME: The Body
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b21.

IsaacExt:CrownOfLight.NAME: Crown Of Light
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b20 #ySoul #yHeart. NL If your HP is full and didn't take any unblocked damage, gain #yDouble #yDamage at the start of your turn.

IsaacExt:Revelation.NAME: Revelation
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b20 #ySoul #yHearts. NL At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yFlight. NL Right click to use all [E] , deals damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount of [E] spent #b15 times.

IsaacExt:HolyMantle.NAME: Holy Mantle
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.

IsaacExt:AlabasterBox.NAME: Alabaster Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Alabaster Box has to be charged by picking up #ySoul #yHearts or #yBlack #yHearts. NL It requires #b30 charges, when fully charged, right click to obtain #b2 Angel Room relics and #b15 #ySoul #yHearts (If a Devil Deal was taken previously, gain #b10 #ySoul #yHearts and one Angel Room relic instead).

IsaacExt:TheStairway.NAME: The Stairway
IsaacExt:TheStairway.FLAVOR: May you get what you came for.
DESCRIPTIONS: The shop has a #b50% chance of selling the #yrelics from the #yAngel #yRoom.

IsaacExt:BookOfVirtues.NAME: Book Of Virtues
DESCRIPTIONS: #b4 charges, when fully charged, right click to summon a wisp. NL When you have any other chargeable relic, this relic cannot be used by right clicking directly. NL When you right click to use any other chargeable relics, summon a wisp with corresponding special effects.

IsaacExt:EchoChamber.NAME: Echo Chamber
IsaacExt:EchoChamber.FLAVOR: I can see see the future future future...
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play in each turn will trigger the effect of the first card you play in each turn of the combat once.

IsaacExt:Damocles.NAME: Damocles
IsaacExt:Damocles.FLAVOR: A king’sfortune... but at what cost?
DESCRIPTIONS: An extra relic is gained after battle, but have chance to die when you lose HP #yfrom #yenemies, #b10% at the beginning and gain #b4% chance whenever you gain damage. If your next hp loss will cause death, it will begin to pulse to remind you. NL When resurrected, lose this relic.

IsaacExt:PlumFlute.NAME: Plum Flute
DESCRIPTIONS: #b4 charges, when fully charged, right-click to summons #yBaby #yPlum to fight for you in the current room. NL Will leave after #b3 intents.

IsaacExt:Birthright.NAME: Birthright
DESCRIPTIONS: It has different effects on each character.

IsaacExt:EmptyBirthrightRelic.NAME: Empty
DESCRIPTIONS: It has different effects on each character.
Every time you #yExhaust #b3 cards, gain #b1 #yStrength.
The first time you discard a card each turn, draw #b1.
The #yPowers you draw or add to hand will be #yRetained.
Whenever you change Stances, gain #b2 #yMantra.

IsaacExt:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: #b1 charge, when fully charged, right-click to obtain a random relic for the current room. NL Using this relic multiple times in the same room will replace the previous relic with a new one.
